properties.name: app.ui.base
properties.description: the base UI template page name in src/main/webapp

properties.name: app.ui.content
properties.description: content with which to populate app.ui.base, also located in same folder.

properties.name: app.protect.authenticated
properties.description: limit these pages to authenticated users. Use '=/route1' for a single route. Use '=/route1, /route2' for multiple.
